comment._content: Those were the days when it was safe for royalty to drive safely through a city in an open top car......not a bullet proof one as they do today.

comment.author: 32605636@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/hwmobs] That's true! There seems to be a greater level of connection between the people and the visitors in all of the Royal Tour photographs.
